name: Thoughts from my house at 2am (when I can do anything but sleep)
name_original: Thoughts from my house at 2am (when I can do anything but sleep)
description:
A short game, made during the 2020 pandemic lockdowns. This is my first Bitsy game (or proper game at all, for that matter), so I have to that @videodante (on Twitter and Itch.io) for appearing on my timeline and sharing this wonderfully minimalist game tool with me.

This is a walking simulator, so there is no real objectives, other than to explore your environment, solve a few simple puzzles, and learn some more about yourself/character.

I hope you enjoy!
